column4: on a dev team with a bunch of people that use tortoise svn 1.6.3, the version of svn that comes with ubuntu 9.04 is *ancient* is there a way to get the latest release of svn without going through the whole source building rigmarole?
have you enabled the backports repo?
cp is not a good backup tool. especially when it's invoked as a non-root user ;)
